Sample:
{
  "Conditions": [
    {
      "Aggregator": "AVG",
      "Field": "temperature",
      "Operator": "GreaterThan",
      "Value": "70"
    },
    {
      "Aggregator": "AVG",
      "Field": "pressure",
      "Operator": "GreaterThan",
      "Value": "250"
    }
  ],
  "AggregationWindow": "tumblingwindow5minutes",
  "DateCreated": "2018-03-19T08:36:00-07:00",
  "DateModified": "2018-03-19T08:36:00-07:00",
  "Description": "temperature > 73 And pressure > 250",
  "ETag": "*",
  "Enabled": true,
  "GroupId": "default_Chillers",
  "Id": "default_Chiller_Pressure_High",
  "Name": "Chiller temperature too high and pressure too high",
  "Severity": "critical",
  "__rulefilterjs": "return record.__aggregates.temperature.avg > 70 && record.__aggregates.pressure.avg > 250 ? true : false;"
}
